abstract: National Institutes of Health clinical center in Maryland announces that American aid worker being treated for Ebola is improving.
lead_paragraph: An American aid worker being treated for Ebola at the National Institutes of Health clinical center in Maryland is doing better and has been upgraded from critical to serious condition, the N.I.H. announced Thursday.

headline.main: An American With Ebola Is Improving
headline.print_headline: Science and Health; An American With Ebola Is Improving

snippet: An American aid worker being treated for Ebola at the National Institutes of Health clinical center in Maryland is doing better and has been upgraded from critical to serious condition, the N.I.H. announced Thursday.
